items.name: Inspired Learning
explicitMods: With 4 Notables Allocated in Radius, When you Kill a Rare monster, you gain 1 of its Modifiers for 20 seconds
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.
flavourText: If you do not learn from a won battle
then you have already lost the war.

items.name: Inspired Learning

items.name: The Interrogation
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Small, Medium or Large Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Added passives do not interact with jewel radiuses. Right click to remove from the Socket.
flavourText: But if you seek the truth,
Fear of pain unknown has no parallel.

161.name: Secrets of Suffering
stats:
Cannot Ignite, Chill, Freeze or Shock
Critical Strikes inflict Scorch, Brittle and Sapped
reminderText: (Scorched Enemies have their Elemental Resistances lowered by up to 30%, based on the Fire Damage of the Hit, for 4 seconds)
(Hits have up to +6% Critical Strike Chance against Brittle Enemies, based on the Cold Damage of the Hit which inflicted Brittle, for 4 seconds)
(Sapped Enemies deal up to 20% less Damage, based on the Lightning Damage of the Hit, for 4 seconds)
flavourText: Even within the realm of torture, there are subtle intricacies.
